scheme_name: Mukhyamantri Vyavsayik Pathyakram Margdarshan Evam Utpreran Yojana
brief_description: This initiative offers free coaching to the students belonging to the backward class (BC) and extremely backward class (EBC) of Bihar, helping them prepare for competitive exams like NET, GATE, JRF, Ph.D., and M.Phil.
detailed_description: The "Mukhyamantri Vyavsayik Pathyakram Margdarshan Evam Utpreran Yojana" was launched by the Backward Class and Extremely Backward Class Welfare Department, Government of Bihar, aims to provide free pre-examination coaching to BC and EBC students. This initiative supports students aiming for competitive exams such as NET, GATE, JRF, and Ph.D. Programs. Coaching is offered at select universities and career guidance centers.
benefits: Free Coaching: Free coaching in the renowned Career Guidance Centers(Page 26) . Note:  There is no hostel provision in the centers.
eligibility_criteria: The applicant must be a permanent resident of Bihar. The applicant should belong to the Backward Class (BC) or Extremely Backward Class (EBC) categories. The applicant's annual family income should not exceed ₹3,00,000/-. The applicant must meet the minimum educational qualifications required for the chosen competitive examination. Note: Applicants will appear for competitive exams under their respective courses. Selection will be based on a multiple-choice written test following the prescribed syllabus.
